oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of Sir Edward Phelips to Sir Dudley Carleton
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Phelips, Edward
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Theater--England--London--History--17th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sir Edward Phelips (c. 1555-1614) was speaker of the House of Commons. In this letter to Sir Dudley Carleton, Viscount Dorchester, dated February 25, 1613, he describes the masques that took place at the marriage of Princess Elizabeth to Frederick V, Elector Palatine.
